item.title: About
item.description: Hey, here's something about me: Introduction Sudhanshu Choudhary is my name. I am a thirteen years old Indian boy. And I am a programmer who's young. I enjoy Coding and Problem Solving. Experienced with programming languages as Python and C++. I love listening to music, a lot! I reside in India, Delhi. I am an eighth grade student at Kendriya Vidyalaya. Achievements Developer of the action called Doctor Colors Questions on the Google Assistant app.
